EmailTemplate.subject: Win the safari of a lifetime to Africa with Safari365
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.FirstName},
As Safari365 celebrates 10 years creating incredible African travel memories, we would like to thank you for your loyal patronage over the years.
In celebration of this milestone, we have decided to give away a safari to to the value of USD10,000 showcasing the best of Southern Africa.
Simply tell us your African favourite destinations and experiences, and recommend a friend who could be interested in winning a trip to Africa. We will send your friend an introductory email with the opportunity to opt out.
Click here to Enter
https://www.safari365.com/competition/{!Account.Members_Club_ID__c}
To all our guests who have travelled with us or already recommended our services to other over the years, we thank you - we would not be celebrating 10 years in business without you
Yours in Safari, Safari365
Prize Inclusive of the following:
4 nights at the luxurious Cape Cadagon boutique hotel in Cape Town A 15 minute helicopter flip over Cape Town 3 nights on safari seeing the Big 5 at Simbavati River Lodge in the Kruger National Park 2 nights at Victoria's Falls at the 5 star Elephant Camp Lodge (including a sunset river cruise and tour of the falls) All internal flights and 4 days of car hire in Cape Town
